description: Easy potatoes roasted with garlic and herbs.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Potatoes with Garlic Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp black pepper, freshly ground (to taste)
1 medium red onion, cut into petals or thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the potatoes well and cut into bite size chunks. Cut off any dirty or black spots, keep as much skin on the potatoes as possible.
Place all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.

In a preheated oven, 220 fan forced, roast the potatoes for about 20-25 minutes until cooked to desired consistency. My roasting tray is small so I did it in 2 batches and I added the paprika in the second batch. You can alter the seasonings as you like.
Once roasted to your liking, take out and enjoy. I made some Woolworths butterflied lamb and beetroot along with my potatoes.
